articles.author: Alex Hammer
articles.title: Dave Chappelle's Netflix special gets 96% user rating on Rotten Tomatoes - scores 43% among critics - Daily Mail
articles.description: Dave Chappelle's controversial Netflix The Closer special has received rave reviews from viewers online, garnering a 96% user rating on Rotten Tomatoes, but scored just 43% with critics.
articles.content: Dave Chappelle's controversial Netflix special The Closer has scored 96 per cent positive reviews from regular viewers on Rotten Tomatoes - but just 43 per cent from woke critics, many of whom have a… [+12794 chars]
